entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to relauch DotNet via Ctrl+R when DotNet is unable to open dll file #34786
  • DOTNET_GENERATE_ASPNET_CERTIFICATE environment variable ignored in dotnet CLI first-time use flow #34779

PullRequests

Updated

  • Add ProjectCapability for Native AOT properties. #34485
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Allow PublishSingleFile and PublishAot specified simultaneously #34419
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2247970 #34778
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
